column5: This Beautiful studio is located in a historic downtown building just steps away from all the shopping & dinning Fredericksburg has to offer. Private parking (hard to get on Main St) is offered.  Time warner Cable & 60min of Free Daily Wifi available.  All guest get a 15% in our boutique located below the studio.  290 Wine Trail Shuttle Pick up is just a block away!  **We are required to collect a 13% Hotel Tax. This will be collected at Check in Time. You can either Pay Cash or Check.
